data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Seattle at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 2, Ismir Pekmic signals a Colorado throw-in in Seattle's half.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
Ismir Pekmic signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to Colorado's area.
In the minute 7, Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Seattle.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Colorado take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Andre Shinyashiki.
Sam Vines with an assist there.
In the minute 13, Seattle pushes forward through Raul Ruidiaz, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 15, Ismir Pekmic awards Colorado a goal kick.
Ismir Pekmic awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Colorado.
In the minute 18, Colorado's Andre Shinyashiki gets in a shot on goal at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
Throw-in for Seattle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Goal! Jordan Morris equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Cristian Roldan instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Seattle.
In the minute 28, Seattle are caught offside.
Ismir Pekmic signals a Seattle throw-in in Colorado's half.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Ismir Pekmic awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Seattle to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 32, Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Throw-in for Seattle at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yeimar Gomez Andrade for Seattle has been booked by Ismir Pekmic and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Colorado.
In the minute 37, In Commerce City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle drive upfield and Kelvin Leerdam gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Colorado defender.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Seattle needs to be cautious. Colorado have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 41, Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
Keegan Rosenberry puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Seattle.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Nicolas Benezet's header is off-target for Colorado.
Seattle have a goal kick.
Raul Ruidiaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Seattle.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Seattle.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
In the minute 48, Cole Bassett for Colorado gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Commerce City.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Ismir Pekmic signals a Colorado throw-in in Seattle's half.
In Commerce City, Nicolas Benezet of Colorado is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
In the minute 53, Free kick Colorado.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Commerce City.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 56, Ismir Pekmic awards the away team a throw-in.
Nicolas Lodeiro (Seattle) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Commerce City Colorado drive forward through Younes Namli. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 60, Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Seattle.
In the minute 64, Bradley Shaun Smith is replacing Gustav Svensson for the away team.
Cole Bassett of Colorado smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nicolas Benezet for Colorado drives towards goal at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Seattle's Raul Ruidiaz is on target but unsuccessful.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nicolas Mezquida is replacing Younes Namli for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 73, Andre Shinyashiki of Colorado gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Colorado!
In the minute 73, At Dick's Sporting Goods Park, Jordan Morris has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! Cole Bassett extends Colorado's lead to 3-1 in Commerce City with a header.
In the minute 76, Ismir Pekmic signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to Colorado's area.
Alex Roldan is on a sub for Kelvin Leerdam for Seattle.
Throw-in for Seattle close to the penalty box.
In Commerce City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team replace Joao Paulo with Jordy Delem.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Nouhou Tolo with Will Bruin. This is the fourth substitution made today by Brian Schmetzer.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 80, Robin Fraser is making the team's second substitution at Dick's Sporting Goods Park with Drew Moor replacing Nicolas Benezet.
Seattle's Cristian Roldan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Commerce City.
Colorado to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Seattle.
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Seattle.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in high up the field for Colorado in Commerce City.
Ismir Pekmic awards Seattle a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Colorado have a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Colorado make their third substitution with Jonathan Lewis replacing Diego Rubio.
Braian Galvan is replacing Cole Bassett for the home team.
